external_references.description: Vrabie, V. (2020, November). Dissecting a Chinese APT Targeting South Eastern Asian Government Institutions. Retrieved September 19, 2022.

description: The [FunnyDream](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1044) FilepakMonitor component can inject into the Bka.exe process using the `VirtualAllocEx`, `WriteProcessMemory` and `CreateRemoteThread` APIs to load the DLL component.(Citation: Bitdefender FunnyDream Campaign November 2020)
